channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google took a month to shut down Catwatchful, a phone spyware operation hosted on its servers
item.description: Google has suspended the Firebase account of Catwatchful following a TechCrunch investigation. The spyware operation was caught using Google's own ser...

item.title: Join Our Next Livestream: Inside Katie Drummond’s Viral Interview With Bryan Johnson
item.description: On July 31, WIRED’s global editorial director discusses the world of wellness—and beyond—with WIRED reporters.

item.title: Trump’s Anti-Bias AI Order Is Just More Bias
item.description: The Trump administration says it wants AI models free from ideological bias, as it pressures their developers to reflect the president’s worldview.

item.title: Sam Altman warns there’s no legal confidentiality when using ChatGPT as a therapist
item.description: In response to a question about how AI works with today's legal system, Altman said one of the problems of not yet having a legal or policy framework ...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch8 and Watch8 Classic Review: The Squircle
item.description: Samsung introduces a ton of new health-tracking features, some of which are a little strange.

item.title: Lyft to add autonomous shuttles in 2026 as Uber inks more self-driving deals
item.description: It's one of just a few similar partnerships Lyft has struck, while rival Uber has an increasingly long list of robotaxi deals.

item.title: A timeline of the US semiconductor market in 2025
item.description: From leadership changes at legacy semiconductor companies to wishy washy policy around chip exports, a lot has happened already.

item.title: Tesla is reportedly bringing a limited version of its robotaxi service to San Francisco
item.description: There will be an employee in the driver's seat -- a big change from how things have been working in Austin.

item.title: Somnee Smart Sleep Headband Review: High-Tech Help
item.description: This wearable tech maps your brain using EEG sensors and algorithms, delivering therapeutic stimulation to improve sleep. And it succeeds, sort of.

item.title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make you...
